It's not like ftp or irc where files can get corrupted or shortened and you need to redownload.

works great, the keys pakome22 left worked now i had a little problem with x64 bit xp , but all you do is copy the files in side your d3xp ROE folder and paste them inside the doom 3 d3xp folder , remember the files inside the folder NOT the actual folder and it may ask you are you sure you want to replace and say yeah , then boot up  doom 3 and go to mods you will see resurrection of evil click on that AND boom you got the expansion working on xp 64 bit "HOAH"
